name: Deathless Zealot
text: Only the most serious wounds can stop you.
prerequisites: Str 13, Con 17, orc or half-orc, Deathless Initiate, Deathless Master, Diehard, Endurance, Ironhide, base attack bonus +12.
benefit: Whenever a creature rolls to confirm a critical hit against you, it must roll twice and take the lowest result.
staminaText: Whenever a creature threatens a critical hit against you and neither of its confirmation rolls would succeed, you can spend 5 stamina points to make an attack of opportunity against that creature.
text_zh: 只有最恐怖的伤势才能停下你的杀戮。
prerequisites_zh: 力量13，体质17，亡命尖兵，亡命勇士，坚忍，顽强，铁皮（Ironhide, APG），兽人或半兽人，BAB+12。
benefit_zh: 每当一个生物对你进行重击确认，它必须投两次骰并取低。
staminaText_zh: 如果两次重击确认都不成功，花费5点耐力你可以发动一次借机攻击。
